head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KASPER, LOIS M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KASPER, LOIS M.

block.p: KASPER-Lois M. On May 4, 2000. Beloved wife of Dr. Bruce Tuchman. Dear sister of Arlene Gottlieb. Loving cousin of Iris Levinson. Adoring aunt of Suzanne and Tristen Gottlieb, Lauren Sussman, Carly Hirsch, Simon and Nathan Tuchman. Cherished sister-in-law of Ellen and Jeffrey Tuchman. Devoted daughter-in-law of Eli and Estelle Tuchman. Treasured friend and gifted educator. You left the world a better place. We will always love you and miss you. Service Sunday, 12:45PM, at ''The Riverside'' 76 St & Amsterdam Av.
KASPER-Lois. Thank you for your lesson plans on how to be loving, caring, strong and generous. Thank you for loving my brother the way you did. I will always love and miss you. Ellen
